mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_list (card_id, title, created_at) VALUES (#{cardId}, #{title}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, card_id, title, done, created_at, updated_at FROM check_list WHERE card_id = #{cardId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM check_list WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE check_list SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE card_id = #{cardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE check_list cl JOIN card c ON cl.card_id = c.id SET cl.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE c.list_id = #{listId} AND cl.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE check_list cl JOIN card c ON cl.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id SET cl.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE l.board_id = #{boardId} AND cl.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE check_list cl JOIN card c ON cl.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id JOIN board b ON l.board_id = b.id SET cl.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE b.team_id = #{teamId} AND cl.deleted_at IS NULL
